title: File a Zero Sales Tax Return
description: A new business was registered for sales tax but had no sales during its first quarter. It still needs to file a return.

tasks.description: Confirm that the business had zero gross sales for the reporting period.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the lack of sales activity.

tasks.description: Access the state's online tax portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully logs in to the state filing system.

tasks.description: Prepare and file a sales tax return showing zero sales and zero tax due.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully files the required zero return on time.
